original: Motivation is my middle name. Bruce Motivation Kibbutz. You think I'm joking but I had it changed legally last year.
translated: 动力 (motivation) 是我的中间名。Bruce Motivation Kibbutz。别以为我在开玩笑，去年在法院改的名。

original: I also have G tattooed on my left buttock and D on my right buttock to remind me that I am
translated: 我还在左臀上纹了G，右臀上纹了D，提醒自己我

original: . Every morning I touch my toes, look through my legs and see GOD reflected in the full-length mirror. Powerful.
translated: 。每天早上弯腰拉伸的时候，我能从两腿之间看到落地镜里上帝 (GOD) 的倒影。太神奇了。

original: If you can't believe in yourself, believe in me. I inspire.
translated: 如果你不相信自己，请相信我。我能激励你。

original: Self-esteem is my drug. I show men what they can be and women what they can have. Carry a picture of me in your wallet and take a look whenever you feel your fat ass drawn to a slice of pizza, an item of non-branded clothing, or a fuel efficient car.
translated: 我的制胜法宝是自尊心。我向男人展示他们能成为什么，向女人展示她们能拥有什么。在你的钱包里放一张我的照片，一旦相中了哪片比萨、哪件地摊货或者哪辆节能车，就看一眼照片。
